title: Bug 120315 - Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not result in the item being hidden.
EB: Expected result: The item disappears from the preview in PDF. Actual result: The item is still visible in the preview.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Preview the PDF.
   - Expected result: The item is not visible.
   - Actual result: The item is still visible.
